website_summaries.verdict: A hard-sided carry-on with good interior design to help keep your items organized.
pros: Large zipper allows you to lay both sides flat
Can hold a week's worth of clothing
A good value for the price
cons: This model doesn't come with a lock and doesn't have any kind of an expansion option

customer_reviews.title: Only used it a few times and the wheel literally ...
customer_reviews.text: Only used it a few times and the wheel literally shattered off. So frustrating and I had to drag my suitcase around Europe.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Leigh

customer_reviews.title: Dented
customer_reviews.text: It dented on the first trip. My old suitcase is still going strong.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Fat clothing gobbler.
customer_reviews.text: Holds enough clothes for a 360,lb man's weeklong trip to Mexico. Not kidding.
customer_reviews.author: assdripping

customer_reviews.title: Top Choice for Carry On Luggage
customer_reviews.text: I have had this suitcase for two years now and it has kept up quite nicely with moderate use as a carry on bag. The size is perfect for trips lasting up to a week, and the rugged material allows for a guaranteed fit on most flights. It doesn’t expand which limits the use of some carry on bags. My only problem is that the weels are slightly jiggly, which is a pain when walking long distances in airports. It has fit easily in all overhead bins (regional jets to wide bodies). Overall great choice for a carry on bag.
customer_reviews.author: Gus Gatti

customer_reviews.title: The size is really nice however the wheels on the bottom don't work properly
customer_reviews.text: The size is really nice however the wheels on the bottom don't work properly; very hard to move. I ended up having to drag it using the other wheels. Pay more money and get something better. I wish I had!
customer_reviews.author: moe

customer_reviews.title: Half wheeled luggage
customer_reviews.text: Brought this because I travel a lot and carrying a backpack hurts my back so I was kind of excited to use this. I got to the airport and immediately felt like the wheels were not rolling properly. Flipped the luggage to see that one of the back wheels has literally nothing but half the wheel only. So disappointed and honestly ruined the trip. It's annoying dragging a luggage behind with only half the wheel.
customer_reviews.author: Frazel Joy Ayban

customer_reviews.title: Excellent item, a value for the price!!
customer_reviews.text: I've had a few trips with this luggage and it has held up very well. It's roomy and extremely weight. I have to say I have not had a issues with it yet. Everything works fine, and I would definitely buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Roger_O

customer_reviews.title: Cheap. Broke after 2 flights
customer_reviews.text: We liked that this suitcase was light and big. But it broke after our second flight - a wheel was knocked off. I'd spend a bit more and pick higher quality luggage.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Crawford

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, solid wheels, with only 1 shortcoming
customer_reviews.text: This bag made it through an extended stay in several locations throughout Brazil. It did not suffer any damages to the wheels (which work great). My only regret is that it does not have an "expansion zipper", or the option to extend the capacity via the common "side zipper". Great value. Luggage is expensive!
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Leon

customer_reviews.title: Love this suitcase
customer_reviews.text: I've been really happy with this suitcase so far - I've taken it on several trips so far, and it is surprisingly durable and spacious for being a carry-on size piece. I'm so glad I made the move to a hard-side, four-roller suitcase - this one is a great choice, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Sunflowerarni

customer_reviews.title: I took this all through Europe for a month as ...
customer_reviews.text: I took this all through Europe for a month as my only luggage. 10 countries and even more transitions from one location to another and it lasted perfectly. I even checked it once with no issue, but it also fit every carry on requirement of the travel services I used.
customer_reviews.author: Kandace Markovich

customer_reviews.title: Good carry on
customer_reviews.text: I flew JetBlue and was able to carry all of my clothing and supplies for working for a week between this carry on and a backpack. Can't complain
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Murby

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Allegiant carry-on size
customer_reviews.text: I traveled to visit a friend for a week during thanksgiving. I could put all my clothes in this case, along with a small CPAP machine and makeup bag, without expanding it. (Expanding it may make it exceed the depth allowance...) I like the lining fabric and the zip-close top half. The bottom half has a belt to hold the clothes in place, but there is also a long zippered pocket. It seems to be well made. As far as I am concerned, it passes in both form and function! I recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Fergie

customer_reviews.title: Pretty decent, I expected the sides to be slightly ...
customer_reviews.text: Pretty decent, I expected the sides to be slightly harder. I put a large laptop in it right at the zipper, and some jeans and several shirts to last me for a couple weeks. The only bad thing is that every flight I've been on so far they've made it go under. And when you're 2 feet from the door of the plane when they tell you, taking a laptop out doesn't occur to you. It survived the flight out, but when I came back sadly the laptop picked up some cosmetic damage. Not exactly the bags fault though.
customer_reviews.author: Z. Voigtman

customer_reviews.title: Wow!  Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Yesterday my husband and I decided to check out our local Shopco going out of business sale. I stopped to price the luggage knowing my order for two of these carryons would be delivered today. The on sale luggage was really chinsey and about $15 more per item with the discount. These cases are really nice, much sturdier and come in pretty colors; silver for my hubby and rose gold for me. We are both very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: katisaw

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty just like the picture
customer_reviews.text: Out of box exactly as pictured. Wheels rumble a little. Will see how it travels.
customer_reviews.author: Kimbee Shopper

customer_reviews.title: The size is advertised accurately and it meets most Airlines requirements perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: I was very nervous about using this bag since it's advertised to fit perfectly with the restrictions set by American Airlines. In terms of fitting the bag was flawless. Seems durable and had no issues during travel. I have used it for a couple side trips in the car. It is held up beautifully and I have no complaints whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: Devon M.

customer_reviews.title: Great carry on for the price!
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this carry on exceeded expectations. Wheels rolled smoothly in all directions. The case is hard shell plastic that seems very durable. The handle is light weight and extendable. I probably wouldn't lift it when extended and packed, though. Overall it did the job on my east to west coast trip.
customer_reviews.author: Sos

customer_reviews.title: Single trip suitcase
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, this bag only last me ONE trip. Delta threw it around a bit too much and by the time I returned home, one of the wheels was about to fall off and the entire hard plastic casing around that wheel was cracked completely through. Delta refunded me the money but I have to say that I'm not sure the bag was built as well as it could have been if it was this easily destroyed. I got a great deal on the bag ($45) but I think next time I'll invest more and hope the quality gets me a few years worth of airline travel before it's unusable.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa80

customer_reviews.title: Great value and worked on Alaska Airlines as a Carry On!
customer_reviews.text: Very lightweight but had a lot of space for fit everything for a week vacation. We had no problem bringing them on as our carry on, on Alaska Airlines. The wheels worked very smoothly and the handle had different levels of height which was convenient. I love the way that the suitcases looked minimal. I bought luggage tags separately and didn’t have one problem with them
customer_reviews.author: Marleen

customer_reviews.title: Nice and light with good rolling ability, but won't last long?
customer_reviews.text: I have used this carry-on twice so far. I love that it's really lightweight and it rolls well. However, I expect the life expectancy is very short because it looks so cheaply made (and it was cheap.) With my second use, the plane was small, the airlines did it "valet check-in". It now got scratches all over. That's said, it's only cosmetic damages. Hopefully I can use at least few more times.
customer_reviews.author: Emi

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this Luggage!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this Luggage! I needed some new luggage for our trip to visit family for the Holiday's and this luggage is perfect! It's a 3-Piece Set and is perfect for all of my various travel needs. It's lightweight and the 4-wheels make it easy to roll around. The interior is lined and has garment restraint straps and a interior zipper pocket. I really like how the lid has it's own packing space so I can keep things separated. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Lar

customer_reviews.title: Excellent carry-on for Delta
customer_reviews.text: Great for carry-on on Delta flights. Except for the small regional carriers like Delta connection. In those cases you will receive free gate-side checked tags. Fit perfectly in the standard overhead bins. Advice to travelers. Put your carry-on in handle first, wheels out, and flipped on its side. Don’t lay it down sideways or on its belly.
customer_reviews.author: OfflineShopper

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: Have bought 2 of these suitcases & love them. We have taken them on two trips - just returned from an two week international trip with no issues!!!! This suitcase is a great buy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Reger

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Solid suitcase, lots of space - I was able to pack 10 days' worth shirts, pants, socks, under garments and 2 pairs of shoes, and I still had enough space to pack lots more. It is also quite rugged - withstood a 24 hour flight without any scratches. Extremely satisfied. Amazon delivery was swift and it arrived in a neatly packed box. Highly recommended for this price point.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love Love
customer_reviews.text: Travel heavily about 6 months out of the year. This has been nothing but amazing. Very sturdy and spacious. Color makes me feel girly but not like a kid!
customer_reviews.author: Analisha Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Held 18x24 oil painting without damage
customer_reviews.text: I bought this suitcase for one purpose only. I wanted to transport one 18x24 oil painting and three smaller ones cross country. Big one fit, barely (padded with socks). Arrived safely. Had Delta agent put "fragile" sticker on it and it didn't even get dinged!
customer_reviews.author: CAB, mom of 6

customer_reviews.title: Good Luggage
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for a trip to Washington state, and I always fear the abilities of the baggage gorillas. These held up very well and have since gone to Mexico. Light and easy to walk around with. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Weidert

customer_reviews.title: Dented in first use
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure whether to fault the airline or the quality of the suitcase. I purchased this to use as carry on but was asked by the airline to check it due to limited cabin space. The suitcase was literally put on the plane for less than two hours total but returned to me with a large dent on one corner. Otherwise, good for the price.
customer_reviews.author: jc-tri

customer_reviews.title: GREAT GIFT
customer_reviews.text: This suitcase held up better than expected. The pictures of the dents on here had me very cautious.. It held up and I received compliments! Very roomy and was easy to pick up and put above me on the plane. The bottom handle helped with this. I wouldn't sit on it by any means because it is very light weight. I received this as a gift and loved it!
customer_reviews.author: mariah morlan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Exact size for carry-on restrictions. So adorable. I absolutely love this luggage. Will be buying more from this brand. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Gravy Dae

customer_reviews.title: Good traveling
customer_reviews.text: I am so impressed with this lightweight luggage. Easy to use, fills nicely with clothing for up to 4 days (or a week travel if you are a minimalist). Handles nicely with the wheels and hand guidance through the airports as overhead. Nice look too. It can take a few bumps and rough handling I noticed. The pullout handle feels a bit loose but it is holding up, so far so good. I recommend this definitely, give it a try.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great look handle not working on second trip.
customer_reviews.text: I needed a smaller carry on and this seemed to fit the bill and I liked the color. The first trip in November it worked great. Now it's being used for a second time and the handles won't extend down all the way and one side comes out of the handle well. Now I have to figure out a way to make it fit in the overhead on my way home. I'm really disappointed in this.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Gross

customer_reviews.title: Good for consolidating baggage or long trips, much bigger than it looks
customer_reviews.text: This thing is HUGE. It exceeds most airline baggage restrictions and potentially could end up costing more at the airport. If you are packing for three or more or going on a month-long vacation this is a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Bloch

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed for short international trip.
customer_reviews.text: I used this for a 4 day trip from the US to Amsterdam & it's perfect for taking shorter trips when you don't want to bother with checking & hauling full size luggage. I'm a larger person so my clothes take up more room than average but there was plenty of space for even an extra pair of shoes in addition to jeans, sweaters, a full size dop kit, scarves, etc. I had no problems with it being accepted as a carry-on with Delta - again, flying international. I can't wait to take more short trips!
customer_reviews.author: CEJ

customer_reviews.title: Great little travel case
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight and durable. Holds enough clothes for a short trip and it fits perfectly in the overhead compartment on the plane.
customer_reviews.author: bradecki

customer_reviews.title: Great little suitcase!
customer_reviews.text: Great little suitcase! Is well within range for a carry on. It IS a carry on though. I was able to pack enough clothes for about 3 days with another pair of shoes. Casters are smooth and it fits easily in the overhead on smaller planes with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for American Airlines measurements
customer_reviews.text: This bag was the exact size I needed for American Airlines 2018 - 2019 measuments. it rolls great on smooth surfaces. Handle is slightly wobbly but I noticed my other bags handle has that same play. It works just fine and survived some extra abuse from traveling in mexico.
customer_reviews.author: Freeda

customer_reviews.title: Did the job
customer_reviews.text: The bag worked well, rolled well, and held a lot of stuff. If flying in a smaller plan, you’ll have to gate check but will fit in over head compartments on larger airlines. My only complaint is that it was dented by the end of the first trip. Doesn’t give me much hope for long term durability.
customer_reviews.author: sweetcar7688

customer_reviews.title: Trash; wheel corners broke
customer_reviews.text: Trash. Used it a few times (mostly has just been storing things) and on its third flight the corners supporting the wheels broke. Had to buy a new suitcase during travel.
customer_reviews.author: PV

customer_reviews.title: Wrong size!
customer_reviews.text: Was not as described! I ordered the 29" upright pullman. The dimensions of the one I received are 22x14x9 inches. So considerably smaller, which is a shame since I was planning on carrying my computer monitor in this case. The one I received is much too small for that. I probably won't be sending it back though due to shipping costs. I did order another one before this one got here. Hopefully that one is the right size. The reason I gave it two stars instead of one is because of the build quality. It actually is fairly nice. If this second one is the wrong size though, I may have to bump it down to one star.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob K

customer_reviews.title: I really want to like this, but the zipper is terrible
customer_reviews.text: I really want to like this, but the zipper is terrible. Do not get this if you regularly over pack your luggage because your stuff will fall out of this. I do really like the swivel wheels and the look of it though. I put straps around this and some duct tape over the zipper when I travel as extra security.
customer_reviews.author: TheHead

customer_reviews.title: Great color and nice Construction
customer_reviews.text: I have traveled a few time with this suitcase. It is holding up very well. I like the wheels and the lining in the suitcase is good. Love the color!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wheel broke on the first use.
customer_reviews.text: A wheel broke on my first trip using the luggage. Of course it's on the handle side, so I have to drag it around as the broken wheel leaves a black skid mark across the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Bad bag
customer_reviews.text: This is a terrible product. It felt flimsy on the outside out of the box. It also did not roll well out of the box. My wife used it for the first time on a trip this past weekend, and a whole corner with a wheel came off.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Great conditions! Fast delivery! Perfect carry-on!
customer_reviews.text: It got to me very fast. New and in great conditions. The color and measurements were as promised! I will be able to use as a carry- on for my vacations!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality. Reliable product
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Very reliable product. I’ve been on more than 10 trips with it. Very nice look. I just wish it was one size bigger then it would be perfect. I personally like to pack a couple options of outfits so with just one luggage, this would be sufficient for a two-three day travel (not in cold weather though) but more than that, I'd need another luggage.
customer_reviews.author: Angelia Serrano

customer_reviews.title: It arrived severely defected
customer_reviews.text: It arrived with the side caved in. This hard shell luggage is meant to be durable but yet it couldn’t survive one trip in the mail. Not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: KMH

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for a trip to NYC. Perfect for the train, subway, and navigating the streets of Brooklyn. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: KJ&B

customer_reviews.title: Very steady
customer_reviews.text: Has Held up for two moves now! I like that you don’t have to tilt the bag back in order to roll it. The four wheels roll On most services.
customer_reviews.author: shopper

customer_reviews.title: Good carry on. Decent
customer_reviews.text: Took this to New York for a quick trip. Rolls nicely. Handle seems a little iffy like it could break any moment, after several uses it stopped going down all the way and is hard to pull up. Perfect carry on size. Fits a lot and zipper never broke.
customer_reviews.author: Joan C Swan

customer_reviews.title: Easy for Overhead
customer_reviews.text: This bag is so easy to travel with! smooth wheels, sturdy, lightweight, and perfect for overhead storage. I am going to buy a second one for my kid. LOVE the color choices too.
customer_reviews.author: mermaid

customer_reviews.title: Not what I ordered
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this last minute for an unexpected trip I'm taking. I'm so horribly disappointed because this is not what I ordered. It's not hard shell and looks NOTHING like the advertised picture. I have no choice but to keep it since I leave tomorrow. I don't recommend this product to anyone unless you don't mind paying for something you won't get.
customer_reviews.author: Monique Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: The handle is flimsy and the outside scuffs very easily.
customer_reviews.text: This suitcase was used for a quick 4 day trip, so there were just some clothes and personal belongings in the bag. When I tried to push it, the handle felt like it was going to snap in half, and pulling it was even harder. The bag was pretty light in comparison to other suitcases (this one was $70 so I was expecting much better results). I would not recommend this to anybody.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 9 year old and it is perfect. She can move it easily and has no trouble with the handle slide! It is perfect for weekend trips and is durable! I would recommend this product !
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Trent Ratliff

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I needed a bag for a quick weekend getaway and did not want to pay for a checked bad. This fit the bill and the perfect size for a carry on with American Airlines.
customer_reviews.author: M. E. Carter

customer_reviews.title: Perfect carry on
customer_reviews.text: I love the color pink, so cute. The quality is fine too, I've had no issues so far
customer_reviews.author: Lina

customer_reviews.title: I am very pleased with the structure and ability to withstand travel and ...
customer_reviews.text: This suitcase has never ending space.... It is heavy duty and durable. I am very pleased with the structure and ability to withstand travel and the abuse through loading on and off of Airplanes..
customer_reviews.author: Deidre Young

customer_reviews.title: For the price these are excellent for both trains and planes
customer_reviews.text: For the price these are excellent for both trains and planes. These fit under the seats in Amtrak's roomettes - a very nice surprise giving us much more space. Bought 2 for a 4 train cross-country Amtrak trip followed by a flight home. Great cases for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Pratt

customer_reviews.title: Not expandable
customer_reviews.text: I really like my Heritage carry on, I purchased it to match a rosegold suitcase that I had previously purchased from a different company and the shades are almost a perfect match. The only thing I didn’t notice when I purchased it was that the case is not expandable. That’s the only downfall, other than that I love the carry on.
customer_reviews.author: VirgOne

customer_reviews.title: Brittle. Disposable.
customer_reviews.text: Cracked and shattered during first trip. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Alex R.

customer_reviews.title: Handle Snapped Off
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product less than a year ago and only used it three times and the handle snapped right off on my fourth trip. Very disappointing because this was a great suitcase while it lasted.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice suitcase, easy to maneuver.
customer_reviews.text: It's a great suitcase. It's small, but if you want a carry on, than this is the suitcase. It meets the airline standards perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for this price
customer_reviews.text: Great for this price! It’s been over a year since we bought these, 4 trips (8 flights) and they are still like new!
customer_reviews.author: Karen.R

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: This is great for traveling. It holds a lot and so easy to maneuver. Perfect carryon. Looks really nice as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: She was really happy with the product and price
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of this for my neighbor. She was really happy with the product and price. Unlike the other one (of a different brand) I ended up returning, this one has been well thought through on its design, etc. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Malaret

customer_reviews.title: cute
customer_reviews.text: love the color, super cute. and can fit a weeks worth of clothes!
customer_reviews.author: Brianna G.

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift and she says she loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Blessed Gmother

customer_reviews.title: Good and durable luggage
customer_reviews.text: Good and durable luggage. I have used it on a couples trips to Europe and the luggage is still like new. Carry on luggage size, but very spacious. Made with hard plastic which makes it greater quaility.
customer_reviews.author: Pedro

customer_reviews.title: Elegant, sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Nice size, somewhere between medium and whopping large. Sturdy. MAde it to Asia and back without a dent.
customer_reviews.author: Andy R

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Item
customer_reviews.text: I like how lightweight, durable, and spacious this item is. It is carry on size and i was able to fit 5 days worth of clothes, undergarments, toiletries, make up, and shoes. I love this luggage and would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Brittney

customer_reviews.title: Great bag!
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag! Color is cute, fits my things perfectly for carry on!
customer_reviews.author: Darcib

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Love this suitcase the color is so pretty and it’s easy to move around
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Perfect carry on
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 1 more me and 1 for my husband. Holds enough for 3-4 day trip. It's not heavy but does the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: My wife loves this suitcase
customer_reviews.text: The luggage is perfect size for carry on and durable so far. It survived a two week vacation overseas.
customer_reviews.author: T. Donovan

customer_reviews.title: Love this lightweight fashionable carry on
customer_reviews.text: Love this lightweight fashionable carry on ! Nice quality and the wheels that will turn in any direction, including in a circle, are awesome !
customer_reviews.author: Karen B.

customer_reviews.title: Good bag for plane travel
customer_reviews.text: Great bag for packing/traveling through airports. Retractable handle is very wobbly, however.
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than I needed for the 10 day trip I took but great for a weekender if you're someone who packs light
customer_reviews.text: Just used it this weekend. Smaller than I needed for the 10 day trip I took but great for a weekender if you're someone who packs light. I like the zippered compartment.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Zacharias

customer_reviews.title: Blah
customer_reviews.text: Not the solid roller but it fits the price point
customer_reviews.author: Tyrone

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what you pay for!
customer_reviews.text: Great carry on. Solid, no issues. Love that there are 4 wheels, makes it really easy to maneuver around crowds in the airport. I was not about to spend an arm and a leg on luggage. Found this gem, perfect for what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Branden Shelley

customer_reviews.title: False advertising?
customer_reviews.text: A full inch smaller than other colors that were quoted as being the exact same size. Dishonest at best, con artistry at worst.
customer_reviews.author: G. R. Waldron

customer_reviews.title: Best
customer_reviews.text: The thing that I like most about this product is that it moves so fast and smoothly. I wish the price lower than it is now.
customer_reviews.author: Nurur Mamun

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Seems to hold up. Good for the price. I will buy another one soon
customer_reviews.author: Cary Nichols

customer_reviews.title: JUNK!!!
customer_reviews.text: Used twice, never checked, always carry-on. Telescoping handle no longer extends. Total waste of money!! Would’ve given zero if I could’ve
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Frustrated
customer_reviews.text: It’s already broken. My brother took it on one trip and only used the handle once... now it won’t go down.
customer_reviews.author: Dwight Schrute

customer_reviews.title: It is not strong for airline treatment , will break
customer_reviews.text: As you can see not strong enough . I want to know if the warranty will replaced ? But it is not information !!!!
customer_reviews.author: Eleonora

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Carry-On
customer_reviews.text: PERFECT for current carry-on traveling requirements. Also, durable and cute.
customer_reviews.author: TEIS

customer_reviews.title: Great Carry-on Suitcase
customer_reviews.text: This is a great carry-on suitcase. It's the perfect size and is durable, so if I'm forced to check it for any reason I'm not worried about it getting damaged. I've used it on 3 trips so far and it still looks brand new.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ZIPPER QUALITY IS GARABGE
customer_reviews.text: THE BAG SEEMS GREAT AND LIGHT BUT ONCE THE CLOTHS ARE INSIDE I TRIED ZIPPING IT GENTLY AND THE WHOLE ZIPPER BROKE RIGHT BEOFRE MY FLIGHT
customer_reviews.author: Jack K.

customer_reviews.title: It is the perfect size for an extended weekend away
customer_reviews.text: Measurements are exactly as listed. Took this as a carry on with ease on Sun Country. It is the perfect size for an extended weekend away. Easy to roll next to you, and while the handle is a little flimsy when extended all the way, why would you be whipping it around anyway!?
customer_reviews.author: Ethan

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: One wheel was missing when the suitcase came off the plane during the first trip.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broke
customer_reviews.text: After only using this suit case two times, the handle decides that It doesn’t want to extend anymore. It is stuck and will not extend out. To roll the luggage you have to bend down. Very annoyed. I have to buy a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Kyla

customer_reviews.title: A very good suitcase on my side
customer_reviews.text: A very good suitcase on my side. So far it’s made from NJ to SC, SC to Rome then back , and NC to Mexico then back.
customer_reviews.author: Gualpa

customer_reviews.title: Essential piece, not to sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Great carry on, easy to maneuver through airports and fits fine in overhead storage. I do not recommend checking this piece, I had to gate check it and when I picked it up from baggage claim the bottom had cracked
customer_reviews.author: Bethany Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Great suitcase!
customer_reviews.text: Love this suitcase! Perfect size for my work trips and within the new size requirements for travel. Color is as pictured
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Raphael

customer_reviews.title: Broke After the First Trip
customer_reviews.text: I loved the suitcase at first but the handle wouldnt retract after my third airport trip in the same day. Sadly i returned and went ahead and purchased an AWAY piece of luggage.
customer_reviews.author: Cera with a C

customer_reviews.title: After only one trip, the extension handle only locks ...
customer_reviews.text: After only one trip, the extension handle only locks on one side leaving the thing loose and floppy. The case itself has ample room for a weeks worth of clothes but the handle issue would keep me from recommending this product.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick K Palmer

customer_reviews.title: KEEP SHOPPING!
customer_reviews.text: I got this piece of luggage delivered a few days before my trip. I used it while on vacation and it’s already cracked in the corners. This is sadly not a quality product. I do not recommend this piece.
customer_reviews.author: samantha centanni

customer_reviews.title: I needed this bad..
customer_reviews.text: It's a carry on so it didn't take the beating that a checked bag would. Very easy to handle in the airport and on the plane. Didn't have the expansion zipper but I knew that when I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: LPS

customer_reviews.title: Great luggage
customer_reviews.text: It was a Christmas gift to my 8 year old. She lived it. Easy for her to push all on her own. Plenty of room.
customer_reviews.author: CFH

product_meta.title: Heritage Travelware Lincoln Park 20" Hardside 4-Wheel Spinner Carry-on Luggage, Charcoal
product_meta.description: Size:20-Inch Carry On| Color:CharcoalStroll in style with this “Lincoln Park” Collection 20” lightweight embossed hardside 4-wheel spinner upright carry-on luggage from Heritage Travelware. This carry on boasts a lightweight construction and multi-directional 4-wheel spinners that allow for smooth 360 degree movement over any rough surface for complete mobility free-weight rolling. Main compartment features self-repairing coil zippers designed for long lasting use, along with a small loop on the zipper pullers that can fit a TSA lock or pad lock for extra security when needed. Exterior features a top and bottom grab handle for easier maneuvering and to help make it easier to lift the luggage up into the airline bin compartments. This carry on meets almost all U.S. based airline size requirements and boasts a manufacturer’s 10 year limited warranty. The perfect versatile carry on suitcase for travelers whom value both style and function
feature_bullets: Multi-directional 4-wheel spinners allow for smooth, 360-degree movement over any surface
Durable ABS exterior and tear-resistant, fully-lined interior help to protect your belongings
Spacious interior features double sided packing, garment restraints, and a zipper pocket
Retractable push-button telescopic trolley handle extends 41-inches for easy use
Bottom and top grab handles allow for easy lifting
Main compartment zipper features a small loop that can fit a TSA lock or pad lock for extra security
Meets most U. S based & international airline carry-on size requirements and fits into most overhead bins

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars462 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
